mapper.select: select id, name, info, menu, menu_name, create_time, update_time from permission where id in (select permission_id from role_permission where role_id = #{roleId})

select id, name, info, menu, menu_name, create_time, update_time from permission
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and info like concat('%',#{info},'%')
and menu_name like concat('%',#{menuName},'%')
order by id
